ABOUT DONATE PROGRAMS

Save People. Help Our Forces. Stop the War

SHOW YOUR SUPPORT

01

Make a Payment

We Help Children Worldwide. Our Main Focuses:

Psychological help to the children and parents that suffered from war.

Arranging centers for conducting group sessions with children evacuated from the active warzone.

Urgent assistance to women and children being refugees with all the necessities.

Everyone Willing and Having Resources Can Help

Our foundation accepts donations for the purchasing medications and other necessary humanitarian products in Europe. Everyone willing and having resources can help.
